body:
| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | Bump hadoop dependencies to 3.3.4 | https://github.com/palantir/hadoop-crypto/pull/617 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | CryptoStreamFactory creates sympathetic chunking OutputStreams with performance characteristics _matching_ the apache commons-crypto implementation | https://github.com/palantir/hadoop-crypto/pull/587 |
| Improvement | CryptoStreamFactory logs once at `INFO` whether OpenSSL is detected. Systems without OpenSSL no longer log a warning each time encryption or decryption is used. | https://github.com/palantir/hadoop-crypto/pull/592 |

name: 3.2.0-rc1
body:
| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | CryptoStreamFactory creates sympathetic chunking OutputStreams with performance characteristics _matching_ the apache commons-crypto implementation | https://github.com/palantir/hadoop-crypto/pull/587 |
| Improvement | hadoop-crypto only uses the JCE cryptography implementations and no longer relies on openssl or commons-crypto. Performance is not expected to be impacted. | https://github.com/palantir/hadoop-crypto/pull/588 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | Reduce byte[] allocations during reads via ApacheCtrDecryptingSeekableInput | https://github.com/palantir/hadoop-crypto/pull/561 |

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Break | Upgrade to Hadoop 3.x | https://github.com/palantir/hadoop-crypto/pull/442 |
_No documented user facing changes_

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Improvement | Use upstream commons crypto as they published a release newer than 1.0 | https://github.com/palantir/hadoop-crypto/pull/521 |
_No documented user facing changes_

| Type | Description | Link |
| ---- | ----------- | ---- |
| Fix | When CryptoStreamFactory is unable to use apache commons-crypto's fast native codepath, the WARN log line now includes the exception | https://github.com/palantir/hadoop-crypto/pull/302 |
| Fix | Don't initialize the backing file system twice. | https://github.com/palantir/hadoop-crypto/pull/332 |
- Log exception once when initializing native crypto fails

name: 2.7.0-rc1
body: - Pick up latest Apache commons-crypto which has OpenSSL 1.1.0 support
- Dependency version bumps
- Use CBC for symmetric key wrapping to avoid GCM key reuse limitations
- support for decrypting `InputStream`s
- Add AES/GCM key wrapping
- Publish correct POM files
- Downgrade Nebula to fix publishing
- Fix Docker issues that broke publishing
- `StandaloneEncryptedFileSystem` now supports `rename` and `delete` operations on directories
- Fix Hadoop `distCp` by overriding `FileSystem` method
- Delegate GetFileBlockLocations
- All method delegation handled by `DelegatingFileSystem`
- delegate more `FileSystem` calls
- delegate calls to `getDefaultReplication`
- Allow `IBMJCE` Provider

- `ChainedAsyncKeyStorageStrategy` impl
- Convert URI schemes in `PathConvertingFileSystem` to fix `StandaloneEncryptedFileSystem`

- AES-NI support
- Add AsyncKeyStorageStrategy
- EncryptedFileSystem implements FileSystem directly

name: 2.0.0-rc1
body:
- Refactor crypto ciphers and streams into separate project without Hadoop dependencies
- Introduce SeekableInput to replace dependency on FSDataInputStream
- Implement bulk read method in FsCipherInputStream

- Add efs impl (StandaloneEncryptedFileSystem) that is able to be run as a standalone FileSystem
- Implement rename in EncryptedFileSystem
- Fix bug where the length of arrays was being written as a byte rather than an int. This caused serialization failures when using 2048 bit RSA keys to wrap 256 bit AES keys.
Initial release of Hadoop Crypto
